Centre Bell is a sports and entertainment complex in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. 
It opened on March 16, 1996 after nearly three years under construction. It is best 
known as the home of the National Hockey League's Montreal Canadiens ice 
hockey team. It was previously called Centre Molson.
